Article Title: Donovan Mitchell's injury report (March 27, 2025): Is the Cleveland Cavaliers star fit to play against the San Antonio Spurs tonight?
Article Text:
Donovan Mitchell. Image via: David Richard-Imagn Images

Cleveland Cavaliers

Donovan Mitchell

Is Donovan Mitchell playing tonight? Cleveland Cavaliers injury report for tonight‚Äôs game against the San Antonio Spurs (March 27, 2025)

Cavaliers injury report March 27 (Image via NBA)

Evan Mobley rests while Jaylon Tyson remains out

Ty Jerome listed as questionable with knee soreness

Projected lineup against the San Antonio Spurs

Can the Cleveland Cavaliers sustain their dominance?

Thecontinue their dominant season with the league‚Äôs fewest losses, but injuries to key players could disrupt their momentum. Whileis back for tonight‚Äôs game against the San Antonio Spurs, four other players remain sidelined or questionable. Donovan Mitchell missed the Cavs‚Äô previous game against the Portland Trail Blazers due to a groin injury, but the team secured a comfortable win without him. Fortunately for Cleveland, their star guard has been removed from the injury report and will be available against the Spurs. His return provides a major boost as the Cavs aim to solidify their top seed in the Eastern Conference.The Cleveland Cavaliers will be without forward Evan Mobley, as head coach Kenny Atkinson has opted to rest him. Meanwhile, rookie Jaylon Tyson is also out with a bone bruise in his left knee, marking his fifth consecutive missed game. His absence could extend to Friday‚Äôs matchup against the Detroit Pistons, depending on his recovery progress.Backup guard Ty Jerome is a game-time decision due to left knee soreness. His availability will be determined closer to tip-off, leaving Atkinson to adjust rotations if needed. Additionally, G-League players Bates Emoni, Nae‚ÄôQwan Tomlin, and Luke Travers are all out as they fulfill assignments with the Charge, Cleveland‚Äôs affiliate team.With the top seed nearly secured, the Cleveland Cavaliers can afford to manage minutes carefully. However, Atkinson is unlikely to rest too many starters against a Spurs team that, despite missing De‚ÄôAaron Fox and Victor Wembanyama , remains competitive. Here‚Äôs the expected rotation:- PG: Darius Garland | Donovan Mitchell | Craig Porter Jr.- SG: Donovan Mitchell | Sam Merrill | Max Strus- SF: Max Strus | De‚ÄôAndre Hunter | Issac Okoro- PF: Dean Wade | De‚ÄôAndre Hunter | Javonte Green- C: Jarrett Allen | Tristan Thompson | Dean WadeAfter a brief four-game skid earlier this month, Cleveland has rebounded with strong performances against the Jazz and Trail Blazers. Mitchell‚Äôs return further strengthens their chances against a shorthanded Spurs squad. Barring an unexpected collapse, the Cavs appear poised for another victory as they gear up for the playoffs.
Article Summary: Donovan mitchell has been removed from the cleveland cavaliers injury report. Mitchell missed the cavs‚Äô previous game against the portland trail blazers due to a groin injury. Evan mobley rests while jaylon tyson remains out with a bone bruise in his left knee. Ty jerome is a game-time decision due to left knee soreness.

Article Title: Chiefs risk controversy with "greenest green flag" Travis Kelce as mother Donna Kelce drops major Taylor Swift hint in latest post
Article Text:
(Image via Imagn Images)

Noah Gray's rise makes Chiefs' tight end choice obvious

Donna Kelce proudly celebrates Taylor Swift‚Äôs huge night at iHeartRadio Music Awards

"This is the greenest green flag to ever green flag,"

Read More

The Kansas City Chiefs have Travis Kelce back for the 2025-26 season, but his days as the team's top tight end might be numbered.Kelce returns to the Chiefs at age 35, clearly past his prime years. He's a franchise legend, racking up 12,151 receiving yards over 174 regular season games. But his numbers have steadily declined since 2022, the last season he crossed 1,000 receiving yards.Last season, Kelce caught 97 passes on 133 targets, but managed just three touchdowns‚Äîhis career-low. It's reassuring to see Kelce on the field again, but the Chiefs should strongly consider increasing Noah Gray 's snaps.Noah Gray, drafted in the fifth round by the Chiefs in 2021, keeps improving. Last season was Gray's best yet, posting career-highs with 437 receiving yards and five touchdowns from 40 catches on 49 targets.At age 26, Gray is entering his prime years. Keeping him limited behind a declining Kelce could be a serious mistake. Kansas City recognized Gray‚Äôs potential with a contract extension, clearly seeing his value beyond a typical fifth-round pick.Pro Football Focus graded Gray at 74.2 last season, placing him eighth among all tight ends. Kelce's grade was 70.9, ranking him 15th. Gray objectively outperformed Kelce, suggesting it's time for Kansas City to prioritize youth over legacy.Taylor Swift dominated the recent iHeartRadio Music Awards , earning nine awards, including Artist of the Year, Pop Artist of the Year, and a special honor for her global "Eras Tour," plus six fan-voted categories.Though Swift missed the event at the Dolby Theater in LA, she sent a recorded acceptance speech. Fans speculated her boyfriend, Chiefs star Travis Kelce, filmed the video, citing what appeared to be his reflection in Swift's trophy.While that theory remains uncertain, Donna Kelce, Travis' mother, made her support clear. Mama Kelce proudly posted Swift‚Äôs awards haul on Instagram, gathering over 85,000 likes and enthusiastic reactions from fans.a fan another.Donna Kelce has formed a close bond with Swift since she started dating Travis in the summer of 2023, often sitting together at Chiefs games at Arrowhead Stadium. Mama Kelce also openly supports her other daughter-in-law, Kylie Kelce‚Äîwife of former NFL player Jason Kelce‚Äîrecently comforting the couple following the loss of their dog.Swifties have always looked out for Taylor, especially when it comes to her relationships. Her love life‚Äôs been picked apart for years, and fans have stayed cautious‚Äîespecially about how her partners‚Äô families treated her. That‚Äôs why Donna‚Äôs warm, genuine support stands out. It feels like Taylor‚Äôs finally with someone whose family truly values and embraces her.
Article Summary: Travis kelce returns to the chiefs at age 35, clearly past his prime years. Noah gray, drafted in the fifth round by the chiefs in 2021, keeps improving. Gray objectively outperformed kelce, suggesting it's time for kansas city to prioritize youth over legacy.

Article Title: Alex Anzalone: Can Detroit Lions afford to lose their defensive leader?
Article Text:
Alex Anzalone (via: Getty Images)

Alex Anzalone‚Äôs defensive impact: A key piece in Detroit‚Äôs success



Alex Anzalone - 2022 Season Highlights [Detroit Lions LB] üêäüî®

Alex Anzalone's contract dilemma: Will Lions re-sign their defensive leader?



Few players embody the heart and hustle of the Detroit Lions quite like Alex Anzalone . A relentless competitor and vocal leader, he has cemented himself as a cornerstone of the team‚Äôs defense. As Detroit aims for a Super Bowl run, Anzalone‚Äôs leadership and playmaking ability remain vital. But with his contract nearing its end, will the Lions extend their defensive anchor?The 2024 season was shaping up to be another strong campaign for Anzalone until a broken forearm sidelined him for several games. His absence was immediately felt, as the Lions‚Äô defense struggled to maintain the same level of intensity without him. However, when he made his return before the postseason, it became crystal clear just how essential he is to Detroit‚Äôs defensive success.One stat that highlights his impact is his dominance in man coverage. According to Pride of Detroit‚Äôs Al Karsten, Anzalone led all linebackers (minimum 150 snaps) in man coverage snaps last season. The veteran linebacker himself acknowledged this rare skill set, boldly stating on X, "No other LB asked to do what I do."Pro Football Focus further supports his case, grading Anzalone with a 73.7 in coverage, ranking him 17th out of 189 linebackers. His ability to lock down opposing players in coverage is a rare asset at his position, making him one of the most versatile defenders on the team.As Anzalone enters the final year of his three-year, $18 million deal, Detroit faces a tough decision. At 30 years old, he‚Äôs still playing at a high level, but the Lions must weigh the financial implications of keeping him long-term. With rising stars like Aidan Hutchinson due for massive extensions and the team looking to manage cap space efficiently, Anzalone‚Äôs future in Detroit is uncertain.The ideal scenario for the Lions would be finding a way to retain their defensive leader while balancing their financial commitments. If they decide to part ways, Anzalone won‚Äôt be short on suitors. His ability to cover, lead, and adapt to various defensive schemes makes him a valuable asset for any contender looking to bolster their linebacker corps.Also Read: Could Donald Trump own an NFL team? Revisiting his past bids and future possibilities For now, Anzalone remains a cornerstone of Detroit‚Äôs defense, and as the Lions chase championship glory, his presence could make all the difference. Whether his future remains in the Motor City or elsewhere, Alex Anzalone is far from just another linebacker.
Article Summary: Alex anzalone is in the final year of his three-year, $18 million deal with the detroit lions. The 30-year-old linebacker has cemented himself as a cornerstone of the team's defense. His ability to cover, lead, and adapt to various defensive schemes makes him a valuable asset for any contender.

Article Title: If Studio Ghibli made an NHL movie: How Hayao Miyazaki would bring Hockey to life with magic and emotion
Article Text:
Images via YouTube and AP

A story beyond the ice: Themes of resilience, friendship, and dreams

Animation that brings the ice to life with breathtaking visuals

A magical twist: Spirit guardians, folklore, and the soul of the game

Studio Ghibli , known for its breathtaking animation and deeply emotional storytelling, has never tackled hockey‚Äîbut imagine if they did. A Hayao Miyazaki-directed NHL film would be more than just a sports movie; it would be a poetic journey blending the raw intensity of the game with the beauty of nature, the depth of human emotion, and a touch of whimsical magic.Hayao Miyazaki‚Äôs films are never just about their settings; they are about the characters' inner worlds. His NHL movie wouldn‚Äôt focus solely on winning championships but on the spirit of the game. It might follow a young, underdog player struggling with self-doubt, mirroring themes from Kiki‚Äôs Delivery Service or Spirited Away. Perhaps an aging veteran, reminiscent of Porco Rosso, battles past failures while guiding a new generation.Expect themes of resilience, friendship, and dreams‚Äîwhere hockey isn‚Äôt just a game, but a path to personal growth. "The world isn't simple enough to explain in words," Miyazaki once said. His hockey film would likely capture the deeper struggles players face, on and off the ice.Studio Ghibli‚Äôs animation would make every moment on the rink a work of art. The way Miyazaki animates flying‚Äîfluid, free, and exhilarating‚Äîsuggests his depiction of skating would be mesmerizing. Imagine crisp ice shimmering under arena lights, trails of frost curling behind players‚Äô skates, and snowflakes dancing through the air in slow-motion sequences.Nature would play a key role, as it does in all Ghibli films. Perhaps the changing seasons symbolize the players' growth, with autumn leaves falling as training begins and cherry blossoms drifting in the wind when a crucial game arrives.Would Miyazaki‚Äôs NHL movie include supernatural elements? Almost certainly. Maybe the rink is haunted by benevolent spirits who guide players in moments of doubt, much like My Neighbor Totoro‚Äôs forest guardians. A legendary hockey stick imbued with the spirit of past champions could be a central motif, whispering lessons from the past.No Ghibli film is complete without Joe Hisaishi‚Äôs music. His sweeping orchestral pieces would transform every goal, every moment of struggle, into something deeply emotional. Picture a quiet piano melody accompanying a lone skater practicing at dawn, then swelling into a triumphant symphony as the team scores a game-winning goal.Also Read: Former NHL goaltender Wade Flaherty reflects on being the last goalie to be scored on by Wayne Gretzky A Studio Ghibli NHL movie wouldn‚Äôt just be about hockey‚Äîit would be about life, perseverance, and the beauty of human connection. It would remind us that, as in all great Miyazaki films, the journey matters more than the destination.
Article Summary: Studio ghibli has never tackled hockey, but imagine if they did. A hayao miyazaki-directed nhl film would be more than just a sports movie. It would be a poetic journey blending the raw intensity of the game with the beauty of nature and the depth of human emotion.

Article Title: Derrick Henry: Derrick Henry sells his home for $1.6 million below asking price, signaling the end of his Cowboys dream
Article Text:
Baltimore Ravens Derrick Henry | Nathan Ray Seebeck-Imagn Images

Derrick Henry bought his Dallas home with hopes of playing for the Cowboys, but it never happened

The Pivot

Derrick Henry Ready to win in Baltimore w/ Lamar, NFL legacy, Alabama‚Äôs best & RB future |The Pivot

I knew once free agency started that I wanted to work something out [with the Ravens] if we could,

Even though I‚Äôm living in Dallas and Dallas being a perfect situation, as well, because we lived there, we ain‚Äôt got to move‚Ä¶‚Äù

‚ÄúThey ain‚Äôt holla at me at all,‚Äù

Dallas could have been a perfect fit, but now Henry is locked in with the Ravens

Baltimore Ravens ‚Äô star running back Derrick Henry has officially sold his Dallas home, but it‚Äôs not just a routine real estate transaction‚Äîit‚Äôs a symbolic farewell to a long-standing dream. Henry, who was once rumored to be eyeing a future with the Dallas Cowboys , sold the property for $1.6 million, falling short of its original asking price. This move marks the final chapter in his connection to Dallas, a city he once hoped to call his permanent NFL home.Henry originally bought the luxurious 4,154-square-foot home in Inwood Park in 2022. Featuring 20-foot ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, marble floors, and hardwood flooring, the property was a high-end investment. The stunning residence offers four bedrooms, four bathrooms, and a spacious three-car garage. Designed for both comfort and style, it boasts a gourmet kitchen, a cozy fireplace, custom walk-in closets, and a lush turf backyard perfect for outdoor relaxation.He first listed it for $1.8 million in 2023 but later took it off the market before relisting it at $1.6 million with a different real estate agency.According to TMZ, the final sale amount has not been disclosed, but sources suggest it was close to the lowered asking price. The sale ends Henry‚Äôs residential ties to Dallas, a city he had considered home due to his girlfriend, Adrianna Rivas , having family in the area.While Henry‚Äôs Dallas residency was partly personal, it was also fueled by his football aspirations. The running back admitted onpodcast that he had wanted to play for the Cowboys.‚Äù Henry said. ‚ÄúUnfortunately for Henry, the Cowboys never approached him.he revealed, making it clear that the interest was one-sided.Imagining Derrick Henry in the Cowboys‚Äô backfield alongside Dak Prescott was an exciting thought for many fans. His power running style, paired with Dallas‚Äô offensive line, could have been a game-changer. But with the Cowboys sticking to their usual roster-building approach, Henry never got the call.Now, he‚Äôs set to be a major weapon for the Ravens, forming a lethal ground with his peers. While Cowboys fans may be left wondering what could have been, Ravens fans have every reason to celebrate. Henry isn‚Äôt just physically relocating‚Äîhe‚Äôs mentally locked into Baltimore‚Äôs Super Bowl aspirations.Also read - Cam Heyward says he "Stole" DK Metcalf from the Chargers, did he cross the line?
Article Summary: Derrick henry sold his dallas home for $1.6 million, falling short of its original asking price. Henry originally bought the luxurious 4,154-square-foot home in inwood park in 2022. The running back admitted on podcast that he had wanted to play for the cowboys.

Article Title: Former Barcelona star Luis Suarez meets NBA legend Stephen Curry during Golden State Warriors vs Miami Heat game in Florida
Article Text:
Luis Suarez and Stephen Curry (Image via Luis Suarez/Twitter)

Luis Suarez

, the Inter Miami striker and former Barcelona star

Stephen Curry

Luis Suarez embraces Miami Heat‚Äôs sports scene

Inter Miami‚Äôs upcoming challenge

, added another iconic encounter to his list of sporting legends after meeting NBA superstar. The Uruguayan forward, who shares the pitch with Lionel Messi in Major League Soccer, enjoyed VIP access during the Miami Heat ‚Äôs clash with the Golden State Warriors . Alongside his two sons, Benjamin and Lauti, Suarez got the chance to connect with Curry, blending the worlds of football and basketball in a memorable off-field moment.Since joining Inter Miami earlier this year, Suarez has become a fixture at Miami Heat games, taking advantage of the city‚Äôs thriving sports culture during breaks in his football schedule. His appearance at the Kaseya Center for the Heat-Warriors matchup was no exception. The 38-year-old, known for his relentless energy on the pitch, seemed just as enthusiastic in the stands, cheering alongside his family before getting a behind-the-scenes opportunity to meet one of basketball‚Äôs greatest players. Stephen Curry , a four-time NBA champion and two-time MVP, has never hidden his admiration for football‚Äôs elite. In past interviews, the Warriors‚Äô point guard has praised Messi‚Äôs brilliance, and his meeting with Luis Suarez further highlighted the crossover appeal between top athletes. The pair exchanged smiles and posed for photos, with Stephen Curry showing the same warmth he‚Äôs known for on the court. For Suarez, the encounter was another reminder of the global reach of sports stardom‚Äîwhether on the grass or the hardwood.Luis Suarez‚Äôs move to Inter Miami reunited him with former Barcelona teammates Messi, Sergio Busquets, and Jordi Alba, creating a star-studded squad that has drawn massive attention to MLS. His adaptation to life in the U.S. has been smooth, both on and off the field, with his frequent appearances at NBA games showcasing his love for basketball. This isn‚Äôt the first time he‚Äôs been spotted at major sporting events, but meeting Stephen Curry was undoubtedly a standout moment.Also read: "I wanna be the man": Milwaukee Bucks former star Michael Redd reveals why he turned down playing with LeBron James in his prime With the MLS international break ending soon, Luis Suarez will shift focus back to football as Inter Miami prepares to face the Philadelphia Union on Saturday. The match comes amid ongoing speculation about Messi‚Äôs fitness after the Argentine captain skipped World Cup qualifiers. Suarez‚Äôs form will be crucial for the team as they push for a playoff spot, but for now, his brief crossover into the NBA world has given fans another glimpse of his life beyond football.
Article Summary: Luis suarez met nba star stephen curry during miami heat's clash with golden state warriors. Uruguayan striker has become a fixture at miami heat games, taking advantage of the city‚Äôs thriving sports culture. The 38-year-old joined inter miami earlier this year, sharing the pitch with lionel messi.

Article Title: WWE star Natalya to appear on Josh Barnett‚Äôs Bloodsport XIII to lock horns against Miyu Yamashita
Article Text:
(Image Via X/@JoshLBarnett)

WWE star Natalya to lock horns with Miyu Yamashita

Natalya is set to release her new book

Also Read

The lineup for Josh Barnett 's Bloodsport XIII has become more exciting as WWE star Natalya will feature on the show to lock horns against Miyu Yamashita at Bloodsport XIII, which will take place during WrestleMania week, on April 17, 2025, in Las Vegas.This was announced by Josh Barnett recently and it will mark Natalya's Bloodsport debut, while Yamashita enters with a 0-1 record, having lost to Shayna Baszler at Bloodsport XI. As per reports, Natalya recently visited TJPW and other shows, and expressed her keen interest in competing around the world, representing WWE.Natalya is confirmed to lock horns with karate fighter Miyu Yamashita at Josh Barnett's Bloodsport XIII. This was announced in an X post on March 27, 2025, by Josh Barnett himself.In the post, he wrote: ‚ÄúWhen wrestlers of this caliber ask for a fight with one another, then a fight we will have. ‚ÄúQueen of Harts‚Äù Nattie Neidhart is taking on the karate fighter, Miyu Yamashita, at Josh Barnett‚Äôs Bloodsport XIII. Don‚Äôt miss your chance to see these two go head to head live!‚ÄùThis came as a response after Natalya made a simple statement about facing Miyu. She wrote in the post: ‚ÄúGive me Miyu,‚Äù referring to the TJPW wrestler Miyu Yamashita . Following this event, Yamashita has also expressed her eagerness to face the former WWE Women‚Äôs Champion, after which Barnett has made the match official.Besides Natalya, other names have also been confirmed recently. The Bloodsport XIII event will feature top-tier talents like Davit Modzmanashvili, Tom Lawlor, Timothy Thatcher, Simon Gotch, Shinya Aoki, Jonathan Gresham, Natalya, Royce Isaacs, Maika, Leyla Hirsch, Konami, Karmen Petrovic, Pete Dunne, Karrion, and Gabe Kidd.Besides, Natalya has recently announced that she is all set to release her new book in the form of a memoir very soon. The former SmackDown Champion took to her Instagram handle to announce the launch of her new book, "The Last Hart Beating." The Champion on her Instagram also wrote a caption about the memoir release.Natalya has titled her book, ‚ÄúThe Last Hart Beating: From The Dungeon to WWE.‚Äù She has also co-authored the book with Paul O‚ÄôBrien. In her post, she also mentioned that the book is available for pre-order at the nearest bookstores. Natalya was last seen competing in the recently held WWE Royal Rumble 2025.
Article Summary: Wwe star natalya to lock horns with karate fighter miyu yamashita at josh barnett's bloodsport xiii. The match will take place during wrestlemania week, on april 17, 2025, in las vegas. This was announced by josh barnett recently and it will mark natalya's debut.

Article Title: "Sheldon just came up and buried him" Bruce Boudreau slams Sheldon Keefe for harsh callout of Jonathan Kovacevic after Devils vs. Senators loss
Article Text:
(Image via Getty)

"Kovacevic just needs to play better. That would help."

Bruce Boudreau calls Sheldon Keefe‚Äôs criticism of Jonathan Kovacevic unnecessary and harmful

Is Blue Jays ownership pushing Shapiro to sign Vladdy Jr.? | OverDrive Hour 2 | 03-24-25

"I don‚Äôt know. I mean, I‚Äôve heard Sheldon, but I can‚Äôt recall having a response like that right away,"

"I think Kovy was saying everything as a team, and Sheldon just came up and buried him. I mean, like, he did."

"I don‚Äôt think it does any good when the player is trying to say the right things, and then the coach just comes up and buries him,"

"I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs a positive approach."

Jonathan Kovacevic responds with strong defensive effort against Vancouver Canucks, despite Sheldon Keefe‚Äôs harsh words

Bruce Boudreau isn‚Äôt here for Sheldon Keefe‚Äôs blunt style. After Keefe publicly criticized New Jersey Devils defenseman Jonathan Kovacevic, Boudreau called him out directly. Kovacevic was urging a playoff mindset from his team‚Äîfair point‚Äîbut Keefe just wasn‚Äôt feeling it.Following the Devils' 3-2 loss to the Ottawa Senators, Kovacevic stressed the importance of making Prudential Center a challenging arena for opponents down the stretch. Keefe‚Äôs response? Ice cold:End of press conference. No questions, no follow-up.On TSN‚Äôs OverDrive podcast, Bruce Boudreau openly questioned Sheldon Keefe‚Äôs decision to publicly target Jonathan Kovacevic. Boudreau saw Kovacevic‚Äôs comments as a player genuinely rallying his team. But Keefe‚Äôs response, according to Boudreau, was over the line:Boudreau said.Boudreau knows Keefe's style‚Äîhe‚Äôs called out stars before. Auston Matthews, Mitch Marner, anyone could get it. But usually, Keefe walked those statements back the next day. Boudreau doubts that‚Äôll happen this time around.Boudreau added.Keefe‚Äôs frustration is understandable‚Äîthe Devils are inconsistent lately, 4-6-1 in their last 11 games. But Boudreau‚Äôs got a point: publicly putting your own player on blast probably isn‚Äôt the move.Jonathan Kovacevic isn‚Äôt sulking. Days after Keefe‚Äôs blunt criticism, Kovacevic delivered a key defensive play during Monday‚Äôs matchup against the Vancouver Canucks at Prudential Center. That response matters‚Äîespecially considering Kovacevic recently inked a five-year, $20 million extension with the Devils. He's put up 17 points (1 goal, 16 assists) through 71 games this season.The Devils still sit third in the Metropolitan Division with 81 points, playoff-bound but shaky. Kovacevic stepping up could be exactly the response Keefe wanted‚Äîeven if his methods rubbed Boudreau (and others) the wrong way.
Article Summary: New jersey devils coach sheldon keefe publicly criticized defenseman jonathan kovacevic. Bruce boudreau called keefe's criticism unnecessary and harmful. Kovacevic recently signed a five-year, $20 million extension with the devils. The devils are currently fourth in the metropolitan division with 81 points.

Article Title: Are Travis and Jason Kelce becoming bigger than the NFL? Looking at the Kelce brothers' media empire
Article Text:
Credit: Courtesy photo

Are Kelce brother becoming bigger than the NFL? The rise of New Heights and the Kelce Brand



How The Kelce Brothers Became Social Media Superstars | Athlete Influencers & Brand Lessons

The Kelce brothers, Travis and Jason, have become two of the most recognizable names in football‚Äînot just for their on-field dominance but for their growing influence beyond the sport. While Travis continues to shine as one of the NFL‚Äôs top tight ends for the Kansas City Chiefs , Jason‚Äôs legacy as a former Philadelphia Eagles center remains deeply respected. However, their transition from football stars to media personalities has been nothing short of remarkable. With their hit podcast New Heights, commercial deals, and cultural relevance extending into mainstream entertainment, a question arises‚Äîare the Kelce brothers becoming bigger than the NFL itself?One of the key reasons behind the Kelce brothers‚Äô media success is their widely popular podcast, New Heights. Launched in 2022, the show quickly gained traction, giving fans an unfiltered look into the lives of two of the league‚Äôs most charismatic players. Their chemistry, humor, and candid storytelling have set them apart from other sports-focused podcasts. Unlike traditional NFL coverage, New Heights provides an insider‚Äôs perspective with a mix of personal anecdotes, football insights, and lighthearted banter.The podcast‚Äôs rapid rise has also been fueled by major NFL storylines involving the brothers themselves. From their historic Super Bowl LVII matchup‚Äîwhere they became the first brothers to play against each other in a Super Bowl‚Äîto Travis Kelce ‚Äôs high-profile relationship with pop superstar Taylor Swift, their personal and professional lives have kept fans engaged. These factors have helped New Heights dominate digital platforms, frequently topping podcast charts and racking up millions of views on YouTube.Beyond the podcast, both Travis and Jason have expanded their brand in different ways. Travis, with his magnetic personality, has secured major endorsement deals, made guest appearances on Saturday Night Live, and even ventured into music festivals and entertainment circles. Jason, on the other hand, has leveraged his leadership reputation into storytelling, charitable efforts, and a strong presence in Philadelphia‚Äôs local culture. These ventures have allowed them to transcend football and tap into a broader audience.While the Kelce brothers remain closely tied to the NFL, their media success is beginning to take on a life of its own. The NFL thrives on its star power, but few players in recent history have managed to create a platform as impactful as what Travis and Jason have built. Their appeal now stretches far beyond football, reaching audiences who might not even follow the sport.Travis Kelce‚Äôs involvement with Taylor Swift has only accelerated his cultural status. With Swift‚Äôs massive fan base‚Äîmany of whom had little prior interest in the NFL‚Äîhis presence has contributed to increased viewership and heightened media coverage. His commercials, red-carpet appearances, and off-field activities have positioned him as a crossover star, similar to how figures like Peyton Manning and Tom Brady transitioned into entertainment post-retirement.Jason Kelce , meanwhile, is carving his own path in the media world. Since retiring from football in early 2024, he has already become one of the most sought-after voices in sports media. Whether it‚Äôs analyzing games, delivering heartfelt speeches, or engaging in off-field projects, his ability to connect with fans has made him a respected public figure. Given his storytelling skills and natural charisma, a long-term career in broadcasting or entertainment seems inevitable.While the Kelce brothers‚Äô media empire is undeniably growing, it would be a stretch to say they are "bigger" than the NFL itself. The league remains a global powerhouse with a brand value that far surpasses any individual players. However, what Travis and Jason have accomplished is rare‚Äîthey have created personal brands that hold weight both within and outside of football.Their ability to shape narratives, entertain audiences, and stay relevant even beyond the game is what sets them apart. With their influence continuing to expand, they could very well be among the first modern NFL stars to redefine what a post-football career looks like. Whether it‚Äôs through media, entertainment, or business ventures, the Kelce brothers have positioned themselves as long-term cultural figures, ensuring their legacy will extend far beyond their playing days.Also Read: Jason Kelce opens up about his ‚Äòembarrassing‚Äô weight loss struggle after stepping away from football Travis and Jason Kelce are no longer just elite athletes‚Äîthey are media moguls, entertainers, and cultural influencers. Their podcast New Heights, combined with their individual ventures, has elevated them to a status that few NFL players ever achieve. While they may not be "bigger" than the NFL, they have certainly expanded their reach beyond the sport in a way that is rare for football players. As they continue to grow their media presence, the Kelce brothers are proving that their impact on sports and entertainment is just beginning.
Article Summary: The kelce brothers, travis and jason, have become two of the most recognizable names in football. With their hit podcast new heights, commercial deals, and cultural relevance extending into mainstream entertainment, a question arises‚Äîare the kelcebrothers becoming bigger than the nfl itself?

Article Title: "LeBron James needs to stop": Kendrick Perkins blasts Los Angeles Lakers star over "questionable" Steve Nash podcast move
Article Text:
LeBron James (Image via Getty)

Kendrick Perkins

Mind The Game podcast

Kendrick Perkins calls out LeBron James‚Äô media complaints

‚ÄúLeBron James needs to stop,‚Äù

‚ÄúI‚Äôm so sick of him with this ‚Äòoh how the league is covered‚Äô because he wanted to be covered a certain way.‚Äù

(H/t: ClutchPoints)

The Steve Nash hiring raises eyebrows

‚ÄúRichard Jefferson just got hired on our A-Team. Channing Frye is intelligent as hell. Phil Handy, who won two championships with LeBron. Hell, Draymond Green‚Äîsay what you want, but nobody questions his mind.‚Äù

didn‚Äôt hold back in his latest critique of LeBron James , taking aim at the Lakers star‚Äôs decision to replace JJ Redick with Steve Nash as the new co-host of his. The ESPN analyst‚Äôs comments quickly ignited a debate, with Perkins questioning James‚Äô choices and the underlying messaging behind them.During a Thursday morning segment on ESPN, Kendrick Perkins expressed frustration with LeBron James‚Äô recent remarks about media coverage.Perkins said.Perkins accused the four-time MVP of acting as though his words should be treated as unquestionable truths. He also took issue with what he perceived as James subtly criticizing media figures like Brian Windhorst and Stephen A. Smith, both of whom have recently been embroiled in their own controversies.While Perkins acknowledged Steve Nash ‚Äôs high basketball IQ, he questioned the optics of the decision.Kendrick Perkins‚Äô pointed comparison highlighted a noticeable pattern: all the names he listed are Black basketball figures with strong analytical backgrounds. Though he never explicitly mentioned race, the implication was clear enough to spark widespread discussion on social media.The backlash over Steve Nash‚Äôs hiring isn‚Äôt just about basketball knowledge‚Äîit‚Äôs about representation. Kendrick Perkins‚Äô comments subtly suggested that James overlooked qualified Black voices in favor of a white co-host for the second consecutive time, following JJ Redick‚Äôs initial role.The longstanding conflict between LeBron James and ESPN personalities is exacerbated by this most recent altercation. The connection between the NBA player and the network is further strained because it occurs only days after Stephen A. Smith was criticized for disseminating a false narrative about LeBron.Also read: NBA Star Karl-Anthony Towns raves about Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows: "Lived my samurai dreams!" As the debate continues, the original purpose of Mind The Game‚Äîa deep dive into basketball strategy‚Äîrisks being overshadowed by the surrounding drama.
Article Summary: Kendrick perkins took aim at lebron james‚Äô decision to replace jj redick with steve nash as the new co-host of his podcast. The espn analyst‚Äôs comments quickly ignited a debate, with perkins questioning james' choices and the underlying messaging behind them.

Article Title: Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce couldn‚Äôt stop laughing at Jayson Tatum‚Äôs honest reaction to his nickname ‚ÄòThe Anomaly‚Äô
Article Text:
Jayson Tatum and Travis Kelce. Image via: Mitchell Leff/ Getty Images | New Heights Podcast (screengrab)

Jayson Tatum reacted to his nickname ‚ÄòThe Anomaly‚Äô while speaking with Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce



Where did Jayson Tatum‚Äôs nickname come from?



Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum ‚Äôs reaction to a particular nickname has sparked plenty of discussion among fans and media alike. Tatum, who has been a star player for the Celtics, recently addressed the growing trend of people calling him ‚Äò The Anomaly ‚Äô during his chat with NFL star siblings Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce in a new episode a their New Heights podcast .During a guest appearance on the New Heights podcast hosted by NFL stars Travis and Jason Kelce, Jayson Tatum was asked about the nickname that has been making rounds on social media. Travis Kelce, referring to Tatum‚Äôs Wikipedia page, brought up the moniker and asked, ‚ÄúHas anybody that is close to you ever actually called you, ‚ÄòThe Anomaly‚Äô?‚ÄùTatum was amused. He responded with a candid answer that sent the Kelce brothers into fits of laughter. ‚ÄúTwitter is not a real place, I‚Äôll say that,‚Äù Tatum hared. His reaction made it clear that he wasn‚Äôt exactly embracing the nickname, despite its growing popularity.Jason Kelce, however, had a different take. ‚ÄúI would run with that one. I like it. ‚ÄòThe Anomaly‚Äô is a good one. I don‚Äôt know who came up with that.‚Äù To which Travis Kelce agreed, saying, ‚ÄúIt is a banger.‚ÄùThe origins of ‚ÄòThe Anomaly‚Äô trace back to social media, where an X user first suggested it, pointing out Tatum‚Äôs unique skill set. ‚ÄúHandles like someone 6 inches shorter, shoots pull-ups like a guard, finishes at the rim like a center, and consistently defends 1-5.‚ÄùThe nickname got wide attention, and soon, even official team accounts like the Portland Trail Blazers started using it in their game promotions. Basketball Reference has even added it to Tatum‚Äôs list of nicknames.Previously, when asked directly if he liked the name, he hesitated before admitting, ‚ÄúAhhh, I don‚Äôt know.‚Äù He went on to mention that friends and teammates call him by other names, such as ‚ÄòBig Deuce‚Äô and ‚ÄòTaco.‚ÄôAlso Read: Jayson Tatum's injury report (March 26, 2025): Is the Boston Celtics star fit to play against the Phoenix Suns tonight? Regardless of whether ‚ÄòThe Anomaly‚Äô nickname sticks, there‚Äôs no denying that Tatum‚Äôs game lives up to the title. At 6‚Äô10‚Äù, his mobility, ball-handling, and scoring ability make him one of the most versatile players in the NBA. He has been a standout star for the Celtics and is arguably one of the most complete players in the league today.
Article Summary: Boston celtics star jayson tatum was a guest on the new heights podcast. He was asked about his nickname 'the anomaly' and his reaction. Tatum responded by saying, "twitter is not a real place, i‚Äôll say that"

Article Title: IPL match today, RR vs KKR: Dream 11 Team Prediction, head to head, Barsapara Cricket Stadium pitch report, weather in Guwahati
Article Text:
Kolkata Knight Riders' players Quinton de Kock and Rinku Singh during a training session ahead of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 match against Rajasthan Royals at ACA Stadium in Guwahati. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

RR vs KKR IPL 2025, Guwahati weather prediction

IPL 2025: How will KKR, MI, CSK, SRH, RCB fare this season?

After being outclassed in their previous matches, title holders Kolkata Knight Riders and Rajasthan Royals are looking for a quick turnaround when they meet in an IPL match today (March 26).The Knight Riders lost to Royal Challengers Bengaluru by seven wickets in their opener, while the Royals suffered a 44-run defeat against Sunrisers Hyderabad.Both teams share a common issue: their once-impressive batting and bowling units have failed to perform. While the Royals might attribute their bowling struggles to playing at a difficult Hyderabad venue, the Knight Riders lack such an excuse.Except for Sunil Narine, none of the KKR bowlers managed to restrain the aggressive RCB lineup, raising concerns about the effectiveness of mystery spinner Varun Chakravarthy, who struggled significantly. Even on Eden Gardens' pitch, which had some grip, Chakravarthy was hit hard by Phil Salt and Virat Kohli.The KKR camp is hopeful that Chakravarthy will regain his form on a Guwahati pitch that typically offers more assistance to bowlers.The Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati has hosted four matches in IPL history - two in 2023 and two in 2024. The highest total at this ground came courtesy Rajasthan Royals who scored 199 against Delhi Capitals. The RR vs KKR fixture was washed out last year at this venue.Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Riyan Parag(c), Nitish Rana, Dhruv Jurel(wk), Shimron Hetmyer, Shubham Dubey, Jofra Archer, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Tushar Deshpande, Sandeep Sharma, Akash Madhwal.Yudhvir Charak/Kunal Singh Rathore.Quinton de Kock (w), Sunil Narine, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Venkatesh Iyer, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Rinku Singh, Andre Russell, Ramandeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Spencer Johnson, Varun Chakaravarthy.Vaibhav Arora/Manish Pandey.Sanju Samson (c), Yashasvi Jaiswal, Riyan Parag, Dhruv Jurel, Jofra Archer, Shimron Hetmyer, Tushar Deshpande, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Nitish Rana, Sandeep Sharma, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Kwena Maphaka, Akash Madhwal, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Shubham Dubey, Yudhvir Singh, Kunal Singh Rathore, Ashok Sharma, Kumar KartikeyaRinku Singh, Varun Chakaravarthy, Sunil Narine, Andre Russell, Harshit Rana, Ramandeep Singh, Venkatesh Iyer, Quinton de Kock, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Anrich Nortje, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Vaibhav Arora, Mayank Markande, Rovman Powell, Manish Pandey, Spencer Johnson, Luvnith Sisodia, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Anukul Roy, Moeen Ali, Chetan SakariyaAs the RR vs KKR head-to-head record reads, the two teams have played each other 30 times in the IPL, with the Royals and the Knight Riders winning 14 each. Two matches ended in no results.Interestingly two of the matches between the two teams went into Super Overs with the Royals clinching both of them.Guwahati is predicted to witness nearly 50% humidity while reeling 25-30 degree Celsius weather. The humidity level is expected to rise as the evening progresses which could make things daunting for the team fielding second.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders and rajasthan royals meet in ipl match today (march 26) knight riders lost to royal challengers bengaluru by seven wickets in their opener. Royals suffered a 44-run defeat against sunrisers hyderabad. The rr vs kkr fixture was washed out last year at this venue.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Orange Cap and Purple Cap Updated Standings: Nicholas Pooran and Shardul Thakur lead the race
Article Text:
Nicholas Pooran (PTI Photo)

Poll Which player had the most impressive strike rate so far in the IPL? Quinton de Kock Ishan Kishan Shreyas Iyer

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

IPL Orange Cap Standings 2025

Player Matches Runs Average SR Nicholas Pooran (LSG) 2 145 72.5 258.92 Mitchell Marsh (LSG) 2 124 62 185.07 Travis Head (SRH) 2 114 57 193.22 Ishan Kishan (SRH) 2 106 106 220.83 Dhruv Jurel (RR) 2 103 70 163.49

IPL Purple Cap Standings 2025



Player Matches Wickets Ave. Econ. BBI Shardul Thakur (LSG) 2 6 8.83 8.83 4/34 Noor Ahmad (CSK) 1 4 4.50 4.50 4/18 Krunal Pandya (RCB) 1 3 9.66 7.25 3/29 Khaleel Ahmed (CSK) 1 3 9.66 7.25 3/29 Varun Chakaravarthy (KKR) 2 3 20.00 7.50 2/17

Lucknow Super Giants' (LSG) emphatic five-wicket win over Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) not only got them their first points in IPL 2025 but also propelled two of their star performers to the top of the Orange and Purple Cap standings.Nicholas Pooran‚Äôs blistering knock of 70 off just 26 balls helped him become the tournament‚Äôs leading run-scorer, while Shardul Thakur‚Äôs sensational four-wicket haul made him the highest wicket-taker. With this victory, LSG also sent a strong message to the other teams, showing their firepower with both bat and ball.Pooran has been in sublime form, amassing 145 runs in just two matches at a staggering strike rate of 258.92. His fearless approach against SRH, where he hammered seven boundaries and six sixes, made him a nightmare for the opposition.He now leads the Orange Cap race, with his teammate Mitchell Marsh (124 runs) following closely behind in second place. Travis Head (114 runs) and Ishan Kishan (106 runs), both from SRH, are also in the top five, but their performances weren‚Äôt enough to prevent their team‚Äôs defeat. Rajasthan Royals‚Äô Dhruv Jurel (103 runs) completes the list, showcasing the rising talent in the league.On the bowling front, Shardul Thakur‚Äôs heroics with the ball have put him firmly in the lead for the Purple Cap. His spell of 4/34 against SRH dismantled their top order, including the prized wicket of Ishan Kishan for a golden duck.Thakur‚Äôs ability to strike at crucial moments has given LSG a major edge in their campaign. Following him is Chennai Super Kings‚Äô Noor Ahmad , who bagged an impressive 4/18 in his only outing so far. Krunal Pandya (RCB) and Khaleel Ahmed (CSK) are tied with three wickets each, while KKR‚Äôs Varun Chakaravarthy also finds himself in the top five despite a higher average.As the tournament progresses, both the Orange and Purple Cap races are expected to intensify. With Pooran and Thakur currently leading the charts, LSG will look to build on this momentum when they take on Punjab Kings in their next clash. Fans can expect more fireworks as the race for individual and team glory heats up in IPL 2025.
Article Summary: Lucknow super giants (lsg) beat sunrisers hyderabad (srh) by five wickets. Nicholas pooran and shardul thakur are top of the orange and purple cap standings. Pooran has scored 145 runs in two matches at a strike rate of 258.92. Thakarur has taken four wickets for the purple cap so far.

Factors working against Brooklyn‚Äôs retention:

Day‚ÄôRon Sharpe‚Äôs background and upside

Why the Los Angeles Lakers make sense

Theare expected to target a young, versatile big man in free agency this summer, and Brooklyn Nets ‚Äô backup centerhas emerged as a potential option. With Sharpe‚Äôs steady improvement and a likely crowded market for his services, the Lakers could face competition to secure the 23-year-old‚Äôs signature.Day‚ÄôRon Sharpe, a 6‚Äô9‚Äù power forward/center hybrid, is having his best NBA season in 2024-25, posting career highs in points (7.9), rebounds (6.6), assists (1.8), and blocks (0.8) in just 18.1 minutes per game. His efficiency and athleticism make him an appealing target for a Los Angeles Lakers team that needs frontcourt depth behind Luka Doncic and LeBron James The Nets already have a significant investment in starting center Nicolas Claxton ($25.4 million next season), which may limit their willingness to match aggressive offers for Sharpe.As Eric Pincus of Bleacher Report noted,- Financial commitment to Claxton- Sharpe‚Äôs rising market value- Potential for a bigger role elsewhereDrafted 29th overall in 2021 out of North Carolina, Sharpe was a McDonald‚Äôs All-American at Montverde Academy, a program known for producing NBA talent like Cooper Flagg and Derik Queen. His development over four seasons with the Nets has showcased his potential as a reliable rotation player with room to grow.- Need for a young, athletic big to complement Davis- Cap flexibility to outbid Brooklyn- Opportunity for Sharpe to play a larger roleAlso read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could sign 7-foot-1 Boston Celtics star forward to bolster squad around Luka-LeBron duo With multiple teams expected to pursue Sharpe, the Los Angeles Lakers will need to act quickly in free agency. If Brooklyn hesitates to match offers, Los Angeles could land a promising frontcourt piece at a reasonable price.
Article Summary: Day‚Äôron sharpe, a 6‚Äô9‚Äù power forward/center hybrid, is having his best nba season in 2024-25. His efficiency and athleticism make him an appealing target for a los angeles lakers team that needs frontcourt depth behind luka doncic and lebron james.

Article Title: First batch of women at NDA has big responsibility, says battalion cadet captain
Article Text:
1

2

Pune: Ritul Duhan's day starts at 5am as she and her fellow cadets assemble at the National Defence Academy 's squadron parade ground to recite the NDA prayer and honour code. Their day, which ends at 10.15pm and consists of physical training, academics and some games, is similar to that of any other NDA cadet.But the women, who are the first female cadets of the academy, feel a bigger sense of responsibility to pave the path for those who follow them in the military."We are obliged and privileged to be a part of the historic moment of the academy. But at the same time, I feel it is a big responsibility for us. Being the first female cadets of the academy, juniors look up to us. They will follow our path. So it is a big privilege and a proud moment for us ," said Duhan, a BTech cadet of the final term.With her appointment as Battalion Cadet Captain, Duhan recognises the significant responsibility she carries. "We are not just completing our training, we are paving the way for future leadership and inspiring younger cadets who will follow our path," she said at the ‚ÄòYugantar' event organised by Southern Command's Zonal Recruiting Office in Pune on Tuesday. About 3,000 aspiring students, including girls NCC cadets, attended the event.Duhan is a national-level basketball player and the daughter of a private contractor. Supported by her parents and driven by determination, she said the three-year NDA experience develops not just military skills, but also provides comprehensive personal growth.The first batch of 17 female cadets is set to pass out from the academy in the upcoming passing-out parade in May. After completing three years of training, these cadets will join the respective forces' academies to complete one year of advanced military training before being commissioned into their respective arms and services of the armed forces.Her resolute mindset that never entertained the thought of surrendering has helped her, she added. "When challenges emerged, I always reminded myself of my initial motivation‚Ä¶ If 40,000 cadets before me could complete this training successfully, there was no reason I couldn't."The academy's adaptation to integrate female cadets has been noteworthy, Duhan pointed out while acknowledging that there were some uncertainties initially. "The atmosphere has become increasingly conducive," she said, and praised the NDA's progressive approach. "I encourage girls to join with a broader purpose, understanding that this training develops every aspect of your personality."Her advice to aspiring female cadets is pragmatic and encouraging: "Any initial reservations will dissolve once you join. The NDA transforms you beyond your expectations, pushing your limits daily through a comprehensive programme of morning drills, academic lectures, sports, and multiple activities."
Article Summary: The first batch of 17 female cadets is set to pass out from the academy in the upcoming passing-out parade in may. After completing three years of training, these cadets will join the respective forces' academies to complete one year of advanced military training.

Article Title: 'If you make me India's coach, I will make Rohit Sharma run 20km': Yograj Singh
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (PTI Photo)

Yograj Singh‚Äôs RAW Podcast on Politics in Cricket, Yuvraj's Cancer, Arjun Tendulkar, MS Dhoni & IPL

Bombay Sports Exchange Episode 1: Interview with Sanjog Gupta, CEO (Sports) at JioStar

NEW DELHI: Former cricketer Yograj Singh , known for his outspoken nature, has once again stirred the cricketing world with his bold remarks.Speaking on Taruwar Kohli‚Äôs "Find a Way" podcast, Yograj passionately defended India‚Äôs senior players, including Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli , amid ongoing scrutiny over their form."If you make me the coach of the Indian team, I will use these same players to transform it into a side that will be unbeatable for ages," he said."People are always ready to throw them out -- drop Rohit Sharma or drop Kohli -- but why? They are going through a rough patch. I would treat them like my kids and tell them, 'I am with you.' I'll tell them, let‚Äôs play Ranji Trophy, or I will make Rohit run 20km. Nobody does that. These players are diamonds. You don‚Äôt throw them out. I will be like their father."Meanwhile, Mumbai Indians ‚Äô star batter Rohit Sharma was spotted swapping his cricket bat for the steering wheel of a boat in Jamnagar.In a viral video circulating online, the former MI skipper was seen confidently navigating the waters, joined by young batter Tilak Varma and a couple of support staff members.This comes after Mumbai Indians‚Äô disappointing start to their IPL 2025 campaign, losing their opener to Chennai Super Kings at Chepauk.Rohit‚Äôs struggles continued as he was dismissed for a duck -- once again falling victim to a left-arm pacer, Khaleel Ahmed this time.With their next game against Gujarat Titans a few days away, the MI squad took a break for team-bonding activities before resuming intense training.While MI await the return of regular skipper Hardik Pandya, who missed the first game due to a slow-over rate suspension, another major concern remains Jasprit Bumrah ‚Äôs availability.MI‚Äôs bowling coach Paras Mhambrey has confirmed that Bumrah is making steady progress at the BCCI Centre of Excellence, but no official return date has been announced.Also see: SRH vs LSG Live Score
Article Summary: Former cricketer yograj singh speaks out on taruwar kohli‚Äôs "find a way" podcast. He defends india's senior players, including rohit sharma and virat kohli, amid ongoing scrutiny over their form. Mumbai indians star batter rohit was spotted swapping his cricket bat for the steering wheel of a boat in jamnagar.

Article Title: Pakistan cricket brings the laughs as Salman Butt hilariously roasts Iftikhar Ahmed's celebration - Watch
Article Text:
Pakistan cricketer Iftikhar Ahmed (Screengrab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: The National T20 Cup semifinal between Abbottabad and Peshawar on Wednesday had its fair share of cricketing action, but it was Iftikhar Ahmed ‚Äôs over-the-top celebration and Salman Butt ‚Äôs cheeky commentary that stole the show.Pakistan all-rounder and Peshawar skipper Iftikhar Ahmed put in an impressive bowling performance, bagging two crucial wickets for Peshawar.One of his biggest scalps was that of Abbottabad skipper Kamran Ghulam , who looked set to build a solid partnership with Shahzaib Khan. However, Iftikhar had other plans.Coming over the wicket, Iftikhar bowled a full-length delivery that tempted Ghulam to go big.The batter took the bait, attempting to clear the boundary, but instead sent the ball straight into the hands of Maaz Sadaqat at long-on.As the fielder completed an easy catch, Iftikhar erupted in pure joy, letting out a fierce roar and celebrating the dismissal as if he had just taken down one of cricket ‚Äôs all-time greats.And that‚Äôs when Salman Butt, on commentary duty, couldn‚Äôt resist taking a hilarious dig at Iftikhar‚Äôs wild reaction.With perfect comedic timing, Butt quipped, "Wow! Has he picked up Viv Richards?" -- implying that Iftikhar‚Äôs celebration was a bit over the top for a domestic T20 match.Watch:The clip of Butt‚Äôs witty remark instantly went viral, leaving fans in splits. Social media erupted with memes and reactions, with many appreciating the former Pakistan captain‚Äôs humor.Despite the lighthearted moment, Peshawar dominated the game.Batting first, they posted a mammoth total of 243 runs, thanks to a breathtaking 148-run knock from Sahibzada Farhan.Abbottabad, in response, faltered under pressure, managing only 187/8 in their 20 overs. Opener Shahzaib Khan fought hard with a quickfire fifty, but the rest of the batting lineup crumbled.While Peshawar‚Äôs win was convincing, it was Salman Butt‚Äôs roast of Iftikhar Ahmed‚Äôs celebration that became the real highlight of the match.
Article Summary: National t20 cup semifinal between abbottabad and peshawar had its fair share of cricketing action. But it was iftikhar ahmed‚Äôs over-the-top celebration and salman butt ‚Äôs cheeky commentary that stole the show.

Article Title: NBA star Karl-Anthony Towns raves about Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows: "Lived my samurai dreams!"
Article Text:
KAT endorses Assassin's Creed Shadows (Image via Ubisoft)

Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows

Karl-Anthony Towns

Karl-Anthony Towns partners with Ubisoft for Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows promo

‚ÄúI wanted to live my Samurai dreams. To have that kind of brute strength, that finesse, that talent, and be able to slice through my enemies,‚Äù

‚ÄúIt was cool to live out my ninja dreams as well. She has so many tools at her disposal, it's just so fun to have two playstyles.‚Äù

(H/t: ClutchPoints)

Towns praises the game‚Äôs Japan setting and combat mechanics

‚ÄúBeing in Japan is something that is hard to explain in words, it needs to be experienced firsthand. But Assassin‚Äôs Creed got close with it. I think this game captures it pretty well,‚Äù

‚ÄúMy favorite was definitely the katana. It was fun to have those moments where I get to establish my dominance,‚Äù

Tweets from Karl-Anthony Towns and early access to Shadows fuel excitement

‚ÄúAssassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows is officially out! Got to play early and trust me‚Äîit's something special. If you know me, you know I'm a huge AC fan, and Shadows takes it to another level. Intense action, epic storytelling, and a world that pulls you in.‚Äù

has already made waves as one of Ubisoft ‚Äôs biggest hits, and now it‚Äôs getting a high-profile boost from NBA star. The New York Knicks center recently shared his excitement for the game in a promotional campaign, praising its dual protagonists, immersive setting, and dynamic combat.In a new advertisement, Towns discussed his hands-on experience with Shadows, highlighting the game‚Äôs dual protagonists‚ÄîYasuke, the powerful samurai, and Fujibayashi Naoe, the stealth-focused ninja.Towns said, referencing Yasuke‚Äôs combat style. He also enjoyed playing as Naoe, noting,The game‚Äôs depiction of feudal Japan left a strong impression on the NBA star.he said.
